column3:
ACK everything except copyright bumps.

This PR's review time will be long...
@paveljanik You can apply the bump script in `contrib/` locally and then diff with my result to see the "actual" diff.\n

The script is not portable... On OS X:

```
date: illegal time format
usage: date [-jnu] [-d dst] [-r seconds] [-t west] [-v[+|-]val[ymwdHMS]] ... 
            [-f fmt date | [[[mm]dd]HH]MM[[cc]yy][.ss]] [+format]
```

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/indirectmap.h doesn't contain copyright header at all.

> https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/indirectmap.h doesn't contain copyright header at all.

Somone would need to ask the author where it came from. Only they can chose the copyright...

> @paveljanik The script is not portable...

I changed something. It may or may not work now.

> ACK everything except copyright bumps.

Agree with @paveljanik

@paveljanik

Can you try the bump script again on osx and ack the diff?
@MarcoFalke Sure, I will try to do it this week.\n

ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8286/commits/fade7e93827646e5f393af8dcbc7e1e5a9717bc9

Fixed script `contrib/devtools/fix-copyright-headers.py` now works even on OS X. Thanks!
Missing dot at the end of sentence.\n
The unit (BTC/kB) of `paytxfee` should be specified here, as it is in `bitcoind -?`.\nI also would completely remove the second sentence.\n

Oh right. I was just moving the sentence.

A general rewrite should be preferred.
Someone catching this exception and reading this line can just uncomment\nit, instead of looking up how to unset zmq...\n
Maybe mention that this is per KB?\n
~~Has this been changed in 2016?~~\nnm: I think so.\n
All fees exposed via the user interface are BTC per kB (or mBTC per Byte). I don't think it adds value to mention it everywhere.\n
But I agree, somehow this whole `examples/bitcoin.conf` file needs update. Though, someone should do it in a later pull, I guess.\n
